reviewText:
The game works completely fine well for me anyway no crashes nothing , the game its self is really fun !

PROS
- Fun combat system
- Lots of goodies to collect if you wanna get 100%
- Awesome level designs
- Challenge Mode (Pretty Entertaining)
- Allows Gamepads (I'm using a xbox 360 controller)
- Multi-player

CONS
- Screen Resolution (maxed at 1024 x 768)
- Quick button events are really hard and confusing because it doesnt actually tell you the buttons it shows icons
- Some voice sfx get drowned out by some of the game but its not too bad

Rating - 7/10 Good game with a few flaws but nothing game breaking , a very enjoyable action packed pirate experience (for some people i guess it doesnt work don't know why)

EDIT: Add me if you need the resolution patcher.

reviewText:
I love this game. Graphics could have been better, but it is an old-ish game, and they're not so bad, that you don't wanna play it.
It's simple and comes with small games in the actual game. There's a bit of humor as we know it from the movies.

One of the reviews states, that it is not playable on 64 bit, but I have no problem, so that has probably been fixed.

reviewText:
It's actually funny just how bad this game is.

It was released in 2007 at PS3 level. So hope you don't mind graphics from PS1 level. Or corridor level design that would have embarrassed a ZX Spectrum.

It's an entirely average generic licensed videogame. Zero inspiration. Repetitive gameplay, but for all that you might get some fun out of the story and voice acting. There's nothing staggeringly wrong here, it's just made no attempt to be anything other than generic hack n slash starring CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW.

And let's face it, that's why we're all here isn't it. CAPTAIN JACK SPARROW in generic hack n slash. That's worth a dollar. Maybe 2.

reviewText: I can't get past the fight with Will Turner on Isla Cruces, it is insanely hard, you have to fight 18 of Davy Jones' crew all at once. Please make this easier, also, you put in people with cannons as arms, they weren't even in the movie, this also ruins the game by makeing in insanely hard.
Despite its numerous flaws I enjoyed this on Xbox 360 and I am enjoying this on PC as well. Have fun and don't mind the mechanics
